verses.name: Numbers 14:16
verses.text: Because the Lord was not able to bring this people into the land which he sware unto them, therefore he hath slain them in the wilderness.

verses.name: Numbers 14:17
verses.text: And now, I beseech thee, let the power of my Lord be great, according as thou hast spoken, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 14:18
verses.text: The Lord is longsuffering, and of great mercy, forgiving iniquity and transgression, and by no means clearing the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children unto the third and fourth generation.
